summary: This document is an email from Kris Gabriele to JoAnn Brown regarding the completion of a collateral review for a loan. It details the approved value of the collateral and the conditions that must be met for the loan process to continue.

persons.name: Kris Gabriele
persons.context: Kris Gabriele is the sender of the email, providing details about the collateral review for a loan.

persons.name: JoAnn Brown
persons.context: JoAnn Brown is the recipient of the email from Kris Gabriele regarding the collateral review.

persons.name: Laura Hoff
persons.context: Laura Hoff is copied on the email regarding the collateral review.

persons.name: Edward Cabrera
persons.context: Edward Cabrera is also copied on the email regarding the collateral review.

keyFacts: The collateral value for the loan is approved at $620,000.
The approval is subject to conditions related to appraisal errors or corrections.
Kris Gabriele has satisfied the original appraisal condition.
